channel.title: chvck.co.uk
channel.description: Pointless, sometimes amusing and deeply, deeply uninteresting to 99.72998% of the population

item.title: Photo a day 3rd Jan
item.description: Firstly, the cat is purely bonus material - the actual focus of the photo is the exercise mat. As a part of my getting fit kick I'm doing a 30 minute body weight exercise programme thing, 90 seconds per exercise. It's pretty simple to do as it's a mobile app a mobile app that displays each exercise with a timer and a video showing what to do. I'm doing this on the days that I'm not going on the turbo or doing something else. So far it's going well, been on the turbo for the last 3 days and hoping that I get into a bit of a routine and it becomes part of my day.
item.dc:creator: chuck

item.title: Photo a day 2nd Jan
item.description: Today I picked up my new phone from work (it was delivered on Friday but I've been on leave), it's a Google Nexus 4. I haven't had much of a play with it yet as I don't yet have a micro sim, I kind of overlooked that small detail. Luckily one of the guys at work has a cutter and is bringing it in tomorrow. I've setup my Google account on it and whacked it on our wifi. So far it seems great, I really like the latest versions of Android anyway. The build quality is more than just a little better than my Wildfire, it feels solid and has a nice weight to it. It's also rather noticably faster. I haven't tried the camera on it yet but will be doing so for tomorrows photo - here's hoping it's better than the one on the Wildfire! As of tomorrow the Wildfire is going to Maura. Should also be interesting to see the battery life.
item.dc:creator: chuck

item.title: 2013 Photo a Day
item.description: The new year has rolled round and so I'm once again going to attempt to take a photo a day. I've tried this for the past 2 years and just failed so this year I'm going to attempt to write a short blog post about each photo to try to make myself think about what my photo will be. Hopefully, this year I'll actually manage to do it!
item.dc:creator: chuck

item.title: Photo a day 1st Jan
item.description: Bikes. Since moving to Oxford I have done little on the biking front and this year I would very much like to rectify that. I've reached out to a local MTB club to see how I go about joining them for rides and I'm going to try to spend more time on the turbo to improve my general cardio. I should note that this is not a new years resolution, I believe that making those is just setting yourself up to fail. As of next week I'm going to have to pack in booze for the most part for medical reasons so getting back on the bike now seems like an ideal time. Put in the effort now it'll be worth it for Summer!
item.dc:creator: chuck
